title: The healthiest city in every state
text:
01 The healthiest city in every state 
USA Today: The long debate over the Affordable Care Act (ACA) has, if nothing else, put the spotlight on the poor state of the countryâ€™s health and health care system. The United States ranks behind most developed nations in life expectancy despite spending more per capita on health care than any other country.
